thread.title: Retirement: Mobile App for EPF Members Launched
thread.title_full: Retirement: Mobile App for EPF Members Launched

author: Moneylife Digital Team
title: Retirement: Mobile App for EPF Members Launched
text: Follow @mldigital Union minister of state for labour and employment, Bandaru Dattatreya, launched three mobile-based services—a mobile application, SMS-based UAN (universal account number) activation and a missed call service—for the Employees Provident Fund (EPF) members. “The members would be able to activate their UAN accounts from the comfort of their mobile phones and can also access their accounts for viewing their monthly credits through the passbook as well as view their details available with EPFO,” the minister said. The app can be downloaded from the EPFO website.
